definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Meanwhile, two classmates danced by the seaside to entertain us.
sentences.chinese: 兩個同學此時也開始在海邊翩翩起舞給我們助興。

sentences.english: As the musicians struck up, the wicker husband and the ugly girl went to dance.
sentences.chinese: 樂師們在演奏，柳條丈夫和醜女孩翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: He declares his love and the two dance.
sentences.chinese: 他向奧琳比雅表白，並與她翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: She was dancing lightly in the georgette skirt, which appears graceful and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 裙子翩翩起舞，顯得格外輕盈飄逸。

sentences.english: They all danced to the quiet music.
sentences.chinese: 他們都隨着那恬靜的音樂而翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 這個衣着華麗的花花公子在枝形吊燈燈光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: I would dance freely on the mist-covered lakes.
sentences.chinese: 我將在薄霧籠罩的湖上翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Iris was a pretty butterfly in blue and purple.
sentences.chinese: 鳶尾花爲藍紫色，花形似翩翩起舞的蝴蝶。

sentences.english: Girls in holiday dress dance to the accompaniment of drums.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘們身着節日盛裝，應着木鼓鼓點翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: How they dance in the courtyard, sweet summer sweat.
sentences.chinese: 他們在庭院裏翩翩起舞，甜蜜夏日，香汗淋漓。

sentences.english: And when you get the choice to sit it out or dance.
sentences.chinese: 當你面臨選擇，是枯坐無爲還是翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Her fingers danced along the silver keys.
sentences.chinese: 她的手指在銀色的按鍵上翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: An unknown number of leafs are dancing in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 不計其數的葉子在微風中翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Goose began to dance on the banks of Frog Jump Pond.
sentences.chinese: 大笨鵝在“蛙跳池塘”的岸邊翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: The children are watching the adults dancing at a side door.
sentences.chinese: 男男女女翩翩起舞，孩子們站在門邊觀看。

sentences.english: The musical fountain after nightfall, with the symphony and dance rhythms.
sentences.chinese: 入夜後的音樂噴泉，隨着交響樂的節奏而翩翩起舞。

definition: to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
to sing at the top of one's voice (idiom)
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
